attributes.additional_details: Every second counts when it comes to a life or death situation, and we all have to eat/drink, so if a paramedic is in a queue in a shop or cafe and an emergency comes through, they should be able to walk straight to the front and be served because this could potentially save someone’s life as they can get to we’re they need to be faster.
attributes.background: I would like parliament to consider allowing ALL paramedics to jump a queue in a shop and be able to pay for their things before other customers. As by standing waiting in a queue it is wasting valuable time that could potentially save someone’s life.
